content: On May 21st at 1PM eastern time; there will be a Free No Limit Holdem Poker tournament on a new crypto poker website which is the utility of French Connection Finance coin. This tournament is completely free to join. The winner will win $500USD + 3 NFTS. When you sign up; for free entry you must use the bonus code: WIN500Best of luck and hopefully someone from here wins!!Website: FCFPOKER.com https://i.ibb.co/tXzmZDd/C9-D10-B38-7755-427-B-B763-25377-F097-FB9.jpgEdited for Karen’s of Bitcointalk “I am not an owner. I am a player”. There was a free tournament so I told people about the promotion and the code I used to play. It was a mistake by me. The site is no longer free. I don’t know if bonus code does anything. Play at your own risk. I apologize. I will be there playing. I have nothing to gain except beating you on the River of a no limit Holdem game. Sorry for posting. The end.

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: I've been looking around in case I might be interested. comments.author: Ulven
comments.body: I am a bit of a poker nut and have been looking for a good game for the iPhone for several months now. I have played several of the free versions, but they always seem to be missing something like being able to chat with other players during play or being able to view all of your stats from past games. There are also some trivial issues such as not being able to start a new game while you are mid-hand. I am looking forward to seeing what you can add in.

comments.author: johndurston
comments.body: Hey guys not an owner. So not about to bother to make a fancy thread. Just a player and was giving you all a heads up. I play on the site; but since it’s new not many players there. But I’ve played and cash out. Just shared for anyone who wanted to take a free swing at $500 and 3 NFTs. Not sure of there value. Every now and then you can get a good game going. So really was just sharing because maybe some people would like the site and one day play and I can play against them and take their cash. So sorry I will not be posting anything fancy. I didn’t have to KYC. I will say that if you decide to play with cash; then Bitcoin is the slowest route. Requires 7 confirmations while bsc deposits take 2-3 minutes max.
